narrative.inOrderTo: assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
narrative.iWantTo:
run the daily regressions at least twice a day
Meta: @skip

scenario.title: (Spanish) Verify all the menu links on the "Get Assistance" tab

examples.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the <menuLinks> in the Get Assistance tab
Then the <menuLinks> page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the buscador de direcciónes in the Get Assistance tab
Then the buscador de direcciónes page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the encontrar ayuda in the Get Assistance tab
Then the encontrar ayuda page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the solicitar asistencia in the Get Assistance tab
Then the solicitar asistencia page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the revisar estatus in the Get Assistance tab
Then the revisar estatus page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the formas de asistencia in the Get Assistance tab
Then the formas de asistencia page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the otra ayuda para recuperación in the Get Assistance tab
Then the otra ayuda para recuperación page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the líderes comunitarios in the Get Assistance tab
Then the líderes comunitarios page should open correctly
